text: Joseph D. Neguse ( ; born May 13, 1984) is an American lawyer and politician. He has been the U.S. representative for Colorado's 2nd congressional district since 2019. He is a member of the Democratic Party. Neguse is the first Eritrean-American elected to the United States Congress and Colorado's first Eritrean-American member of Congress. Neguse has been the House assistant Democratic leader since 2024. ==References== Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Colorado Category:Politicians from Bakersfield, California Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from California Category:Lawyers from Colorado Category:People from Boulder, Colorado
title: Joe Neguse
